attributes.action: Save the Lions in Yemen. Take them to Africa.
attributes.background: The lions of Yemen are starving in captivity and we want to do something about it or at least get them the help they need. If not saved, these lions will die. They need correct treatment and food for their poor conditions and if left any longer they may die. Save these beautiful animals.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.
